name: World Save By Colors
description:
Hi.

i'm new on developing games i hope this is be good game and fun to play, this game make u more focused and it will help u for stimulating your brain, it can be played for all ages ,Especially in children (PEGI +3 ). 

There are 5 levels in the game, if you want to reach all the levels, you only have to focus and win them all because if you lose, you will return from the first level.
You will find a note in each level to understand what you have to do.

Good Luck and Have Fun

Thanks for the ♥support♥.
